vulnerabilities.description: Fee structure can be weaponized to deter requests
vulnerabilities.mechanism:
---

## Fee Structure (VERIFIED 2025)

### Permitted Charges
- **Search Costs**: Actual cost of staff time for searching
- **Review Costs**: Actual cost of legal/administrative review
- **Duplication Costs**: Actual copying and materials costs
- **Electronic Media**: Cost of CDs, USB drives, etc.

### Fee Limitations
- **Itemized Billing**: Required for all charges

vulnerabilities.description: Allows charging for technical work with subjective billing
vulnerabilities.mechanism: Can inflate costs by claiming simple requests require programming

vulnerabilities.description: Agencies can reject requests as too broad or vague
vulnerabilities.mechanism: Subjective interpretation allows denial of valid requests

vulnerabilities.description: Broad exemptions can be misapplied to withhold records
vulnerabilities.mechanism:
**Agency Must Either**:
- Provide requested records
- Deny request with specific exemption citations
- Notify of need for additional time with explanation

---

## Fee Structure (VERIFIED 2025)

### Permitted Charges
- **Search Costs**: Actual cost of staff time for searching
- **Review Costs**: Actual cost of legal/administrative review
